speaking.text: I like coffee and tea.
speaking.translation: Eu gosto de café e chá.

speaking.text: This is my family.
speaking.translation: Esta é minha família.

speaking.text: I live in a small house.
speaking.translation: Eu moro em uma casa pequena.

speaking.text: She has two dogs.
speaking.translation: Ela tem dois cachorros.

speaking.text: We eat breakfast at seven.
speaking.translation: Nós tomamos café da manhã às sete.

speaking.text: I usually go shopping on Saturdays.
speaking.translation: Eu geralmente faço compras aos sábados.

speaking.text: She is taller than her brother.
speaking.translation: Ela é mais alta que o irmão dela.

speaking.text: I am going to visit my grandmother tomorrow.
speaking.translation: Eu vou visitar minha avó amanhã.

speaking.text: We watched a movie last night.
speaking.translation: Nós assistimos a um filme ontem à noite.

speaking.text: Can you help me with this exercise?
speaking.translation: Você pode me ajudar com este exercício?

speaking.text: I used to play basketball when I was younger.
speaking.translation: Eu costumava jogar basquete quando era mais jovem.

speaking.text: She has just finished her university degree.
speaking.translation: Ela acabou de terminar seu curso universitário.

speaking.text: While I was cooking, the phone rang.
speaking.translation: Enquanto eu estava cozinhando, o telefone tocou.

speaking.text: I think technology has changed the way we communicate.
speaking.translation: Eu acho que a tecnologia mudou a forma como nos comunicamos.

speaking.text: You should try to exercise at least three times a week.
speaking.translation: Você deveria tentar se exercitar pelo menos três vezes por semana.

speaking.text: By the time we arrive, they will have already left.
speaking.translation: Quando chegarmos, eles já terão ido embora.

speaking.text: Not only did she win the competition, but she also broke the record.
speaking.translation: Ela não só ganhou a competição, como também quebrou o recorde.

speaking.text: The research suggests that regular exercise can significantly improve mental health.
speaking.translation: A pesquisa sugere que exercício regular pode melhorar significativamente a saúde mental.

speaking.text: Having completed the training, she felt confident about her new role.
speaking.translation: Tendo completado o treinamento, ela se sentiu confiante sobre seu novo papel.

speaking.text: The government has been criticized for failing to address environmental concerns.
speaking.translation: O governo tem sido criticado por não abordar preocupações ambientais.

speaking.text: Were it not for technological advances, global communication would be far more limited.
speaking.translation: Não fossem os avanços tecnológicos, a comunicação global seria muito mais limitada.

speaking.text: The ramifications of climate change are becoming increasingly apparent across diverse ecosystems.
speaking.translation: As ramificações das mudanças climáticas estão se tornando cada vez mais evidentes em diversos ecossistemas.

speaking.text: Scarcely had the announcement been made when controversy erupted.
speaking.translation: Mal o anúncio foi feito quando a controvérsia eclodiu.

speaking.text: The company is committed to fostering an inclusive workplace culture.
speaking.translation: A empresa está comprometida em promover uma cultura de trabalho inclusiva.

speaking.text: The findings underscore the necessity of integrating interdisciplinary approaches.
speaking.translation: Os resultados ressaltam a necessidade de integrar abordagens interdisciplinares.

speaking.text: The juxtaposition of traditional methodologies with contemporary innovations yielded unprecedented results.
speaking.translation: A justaposição de metodologias tradicionais com inovações contemporâneas produziu resultados sem precedentes.

speaking.text: Insofar as economic indicators remain volatile, prudent fiscal management is imperative.
speaking.translation: Na medida em que os indicadores econômicos permanecem voláteis, gestão fiscal prudente é imperativa.

speaking.text: The discourse surrounding artificial intelligence is replete with both utopian aspirations and dystopian anxieties.
speaking.translation: O discurso em torno da inteligência artificial está repleto de aspirações utópicas e ansiedades distópicas.

speaking.text: Albeit marginally effective, the intervention merits further investigation given its novel approach.
speaking.translation: Embora marginalmente eficaz, a intervenção merece investigação adicional dado sua abordagem inovadora.

speaking.text: The confluence of geopolitical tensions and economic uncertainty portends a period of considerable instability.
speaking.translation: A confluência de tensões geopolíticas e incerteza econômica pressagia um período de considerável instabilidade.

listening.text: This is my book.
listening.translation: Este é meu livro.
options: This is my book.
This is your book.
That is my book.
These are my books.

listening.text: I am from Brazil.
listening.translation: Eu sou do Brasil.
options: I am from Brazil.
I am in Brazil.
I go to Brazil.
I like Brazil.

listening.text: The cat is black.
listening.translation: O gato é preto.
options: The cat is black.
The cat is white.
The dog is black.
The cats are black.

listening.text: I like coffee.
listening.translation: Eu gosto de café.
options: I like coffee.
I drink coffee.
I want coffee.
I have coffee.

listening.text: How are you?
listening.translation: Como você está?
options: How are you?
Who are you?
Where are you?
What are you?

listening.text: I'm going to visit my parents next weekend.
listening.translation: Vou visitar meus pais no próximo fim de semana.
options: I'm going to visit my parents next weekend.
I visit my parents next weekend.
I'm visiting my parents last weekend.
I went to visit my parents next weekend.

listening.text: There are too many people in the restaurant.
listening.translation: Há muitas pessoas no restaurante.
options: There are too many people in the restaurant.
There is too many people in the restaurant.
There are too much people in the restaurant.
There were too many people in the restaurant.

listening.text: She can speak three languages fluently.
listening.translation: Ela consegue falar três idiomas fluentemente.
options: She can speak three languages fluently.
She can speaks three languages fluently.
She could speak three languages fluently.
She can spoke three languages fluently.

listening.text: We haven't finished our homework yet.
listening.translation: Ainda não terminamos nossa lição de casa.
options: We haven't finished our homework yet.
We didn't finish our homework yet.
We don't finish our homework yet.
We hadn't finished our homework yet.

listening.text: He's taller than his brother.
listening.translation: Ele é mais alto que seu irmão.
options: He's taller than his brother.
He's more tall than his brother.
He's the tallest than his brother.
He's as tall than his brother.

listening.text: I wish I had studied harder for the exam.
listening.translation: Eu gostaria de ter estudado mais para a prova.
options: I wish I had studied harder for the exam.
I wish I studied harder for the exam.
I hope I had studied harder for the exam.
I wish I have studied harder for the exam.

listening.text: The movie was so boring that we left early.
listening.translation: O filme estava tão chato que saímos cedo.
options: The movie was so boring that we left early.
The movie was too boring that we left early.
The movie was such boring that we left early.
The movie was so bored that we left early.

listening.text: She's used to working under pressure.
listening.translation: Ela está acostumada a trabalhar sob pressão.
options: She's used to working under pressure.
She's used to work under pressure.
She used to working under pressure.
She used to work under pressure.

listening.text: Unless you hurry up, we'll miss the train.
listening.translation: A menos que você se apresse, perderemos o trem.
options: Unless you hurry up, we'll miss the train.
If you don't hurry up, we'll miss the train.
Unless you don't hurry up, we'll miss the train.
Unless you hurry up, we missed the train.

listening.text: The package should have arrived by now.
listening.translation: O pacote deveria ter chegado até agora.
options: The package should have arrived by now.
The package should arrive by now.
The package must have arrived by now.
The package should had arrived by now.

listening.text: Had I known about the traffic, I would have left earlier.
listening.translation: Se eu soubesse sobre o trânsito, teria saído mais cedo.
options: Had I known about the traffic, I would have left earlier.
If I had known about the traffic, I would leave earlier.
Had I knew about the traffic, I would have left earlier.
If I have known about the traffic, I would have left earlier.

listening.text: She's been promoted twice since joining the company.
listening.translation: Ela foi promovida duas vezes desde que entrou na empresa.
options: She's been promoted twice since joining the company.
She was promoted twice since joining the company.
She has promoted twice since joining the company.
She's being promoted twice since joining the company.

listening.text: No sooner had we left than it started raining heavily.
listening.translation: Mal saímos e começou a chover forte.
options: No sooner had we left than it started raining heavily.
No sooner we had left than it started raining heavily.
No sooner we left than it started raining heavily.
No sooner had we left when it started raining heavily.

listening.text: The proposal, having been thoroughly reviewed, was finally approved.
listening.translation: A proposta, tendo sido minuciosamente revisada, foi finalmente aprovada.
options: The proposal, having been thoroughly reviewed, was finally approved.
The proposal, being thoroughly reviewed, was finally approved.
The proposal, had been thoroughly reviewed, was finally approved.
The proposal, has been thoroughly reviewed, was finally approved.

listening.text: It's high time we addressed this issue properly.
listening.translation: Já é hora de abordarmos esta questão adequadamente.
options: It's high time we addressed this issue properly.
It's high time we address this issue properly.
It's high time we have addressed this issue properly.
It's about time we addressed this issue properly.

listening.text: Scarcely had the presentation begun when the power went out.
listening.translation: Mal a apresentação havia começado quando a energia acabou.
options: Scarcely had the presentation begun when the power went out.
Scarcely the presentation had begun when the power went out.
Scarcely had the presentation began when the power went out.
Scarcely the presentation begun when the power went out.

listening.text: The legislation, albeit controversial, represents a significant step forward.
listening.translation: A legislação, embora controversa, representa um passo significativo à frente.
options: The legislation, albeit controversial, represents a significant step forward.
The legislation, although controversial, represents a significant step forward.
The legislation, despite controversial, represents a significant step forward.
The legislation, being controversial, represents a significant step forward.

listening.text: Under no circumstances should confidential information be disclosed.
listening.translation: Em nenhuma circunstância informações confidenciais devem ser divulgadas.
options: Under no circumstances should confidential information be disclosed.
Under no circumstances confidential information should be disclosed.
Under no circumstances should confidential information disclose.
In no circumstances should confidential information be disclosed.

listening.text: The researcher's findings, insofar as they've been verified, support the hypothesis.
listening.translation: As descobertas do pesquisador, na medida em que foram verificadas, apoiam a hipótese.
options: The researcher's findings, insofar as they've been verified, support the hypothesis.
The researcher's findings, as far as they've been verified, support the hypothesis.
The researcher's findings, insofar they've been verified, support the hypothesis.
The researcher's findings, insofar as they're verified, support the hypothesis.

listening.text: Notwithstanding the challenges faced, the team delivered exceptional results.
listening.translation: Apesar dos desafios enfrentados, a equipe entregou resultados excepcionais.
options: Notwithstanding the challenges faced, the team delivered exceptional results.
Notwithstanding the challenges facing, the team delivered exceptional results.
Despite the challenges faced, the team delivered exceptional results.
Notwithstanding of the challenges faced, the team delivered exceptional results.

listening.text: The paradigm shift in economic thinking necessitates a comprehensive reassessment of fiscal policies.
listening.translation: A mudança de paradigma no pensamento econômico necessita uma reavaliação abrangente das políticas fiscais.
options: The paradigm shift in economic thinking necessitates a comprehensive reassessment of fiscal policies.
The paradigm shift in economic thinking requires a comprehensive reassessment of fiscal policies.
The paradigm shift in economic thinking necessitate a comprehensive reassessment of fiscal policies.
The paradigm shift of economic thinking necessitates a comprehensive reassessment of fiscal policies.

listening.text: So entrenched are these beliefs that any attempt at reform is met with fierce resistance.
listening.translation: Tão arraigadas estão essas crenças que qualquer tentativa de reforma é recebida com resistência feroz.
options: So entrenched are these beliefs that any attempt at reform is met with fierce resistance.
These beliefs are so entrenched that any attempt at reform is met with fierce resistance.
So entrenched these beliefs are that any attempt at reform is met with fierce resistance.
So entrenched are these beliefs that any attempt at reform meets with fierce resistance.

listening.text: The proposition, however laudable its intentions, fails to account for the multifaceted nature of the problem.
listening.translation: A proposição, por mais louváveis que sejam suas intenções, não consegue explicar a natureza multifacetada do problema.
options: The proposition, however laudable its intentions, fails to account for the multifaceted nature of the problem.
The proposition, however laudable are its intentions, fails to account for the multifaceted nature of the problem.
The proposition, however laudable its intentions are, fails to account for the multifaceted nature of the problem.
The proposition, whatever laudable its intentions, fails to account for the multifaceted nature of the problem.

listening.text: Little did they suspect that the ostensibly benign legislation would have such far-reaching consequences.
listening.translation: Pouco suspeitavam eles que a legislação ostensivamente benigna teria consequências tão abrangentes.
options: Little did they suspect that the ostensibly benign legislation would have such far-reaching consequences.
Little they suspected that the ostensibly benign legislation would have such far-reaching consequences.
Little did they suspect that the ostensibly benign legislation will have such far-reaching consequences.
They little suspected that the ostensibly benign legislation would have such far-reaching consequences.

listening.text: The phenomenon, as yet insufficiently understood, warrants further empirical investigation.
listening.translation: O fenômeno, ainda insuficientemente compreendido, justifica uma investigação empírica adicional.
options: The phenomenon, as yet insufficiently understood, warrants further empirical investigation.
The phenomenon, yet insufficiently understood, warrants further empirical investigation.
The phenomenon, as yet insufficiently understood, warrant further empirical investigation.
The phenomenon, as insufficiently understood, warrants further empirical investigation.

reading.english: My name is John.
reading.portuguese: Meu nome é John.

reading.english: The cat is small.
reading.portuguese: O gato é pequeno.

reading.english: I have two dogs.
reading.portuguese: Eu tenho dois cachorros.

reading.english: This is my house.
reading.portuguese: Esta é minha casa.

reading.english: Good morning everyone.
reading.portuguese: Bom dia a todos.

reading.english: She usually wakes up at seven o'clock.
reading.portuguese: Ela geralmente acorda às sete horas.

reading.english: I am going to visit my grandparents tomorrow.
reading.portuguese: Eu vou visitar meus avós amanhã.

reading.english: There are many books on the shelf.
reading.portuguese: Há muitos livros na estante.

reading.english: He can swim very well now.
reading.portuguese: Ele consegue nadar muito bem agora.

reading.english: We haven't seen that movie yet.
reading.portuguese: Nós ainda não vimos aquele filme.

reading.english: I wish I could speak French fluently.
reading.portuguese: Eu gostaria de poder falar francês fluentemente.

reading.english: She has been working for this company since two thousand and ten.
reading.portuguese: Ela trabalha para esta empresa desde dois mil e dez.

reading.english: Unless it rains tomorrow, we will go to the beach.
reading.portuguese: A menos que chova amanhã, iremos à praia.

reading.english: The book that I bought yesterday was really interesting.
reading.portuguese: O livro que comprei ontem foi realmente interessante.

reading.english: I would travel more if I had more time.
reading.portuguese: Eu viajaria mais se tivesse mais tempo.

reading.english: Despite feeling exhausted, she managed to finish the presentation on time.
reading.portuguese: Apesar de se sentir exausta, ela conseguiu terminar a apresentação no prazo.

reading.english: By the time we arrive at the station, the train will have already left.
reading.portuguese: Quando chegarmos à estação, o trem já terá partido.

reading.english: The project, having been delayed several times, finally received approval from management.
reading.portuguese: O projeto, tendo sido adiado várias vezes, finalmente recebeu aprovação da gerência.

reading.english: No sooner had the meeting started than the fire alarm went off.
reading.portuguese: Mal a reunião começou, o alarme de incêndio disparou.

reading.english: It's high time we addressed these environmental issues more seriously.
reading.portuguese: Já é hora de abordarmos essas questões ambientais mais seriamente.

reading.english: Scarcely had the conference begun when technical difficulties disrupted the proceedings.
reading.portuguese: Mal a conferência havia começado quando dificuldades técnicas interromperam os trabalhos.

reading.english: The legislation, albeit controversial, represents significant progress in civil rights protection.
reading.portuguese: A legislação, embora controversa, representa progresso significativo na proteção dos direitos civis.

reading.english: Under no circumstances should confidential information be disclosed to unauthorized personnel.
reading.portuguese: Em nenhuma circunstância informações confidenciais devem ser divulgadas a pessoal não autorizado.

reading.english: Were it not for renewable energy innovations, climate change mitigation would be substantially more challenging.
reading.portuguese: Não fossem as inovações em energia renovável, a mitigação das mudanças climáticas seria substancialmente mais desafiadora.

reading.english: The phenomenon, insofar as current research indicates, requires interdisciplinary collaboration for comprehensive understanding.
reading.portuguese: O fenômeno, na medida em que a pesquisa atual indica, requer colaboração interdisciplinar para compreensão abrangente.

reading.english: The ramifications of this unprecedented economic downturn extend far beyond conventional macroeconomic indicators.
reading.portuguese: As ramificações desta crise econômica sem precedentes se estendem muito além dos indicadores macroeconômicos convencionais.

reading.english: So entrenched are these societal norms that any substantive reform encounters formidable institutional resistance.
reading.portuguese: Tão arraigadas estão essas normas sociais que qualquer reforma substantiva encontra resistência institucional formidável.

reading.english: The proposition, however laudable its underlying intentions, fails to adequately address the multifaceted complexities inherent in the situation.
reading.portuguese: A proposição, por mais louváveis que sejam suas intenções subjacentes, não consegue abordar adequadamente as complexidades multifacetadas inerentes à situação.

reading.english: Little did contemporary observers anticipate the profound transformative impact these technological innovations would ultimately exert.
reading.portuguese: Pouco anteciparam os observadores contemporâneos o profundo impacto transformador que essas inovações tecnológicas exerceriam.

reading.english: The epistemological implications, as yet insufficiently scrutinized, warrant rigorous interdisciplinary examination and empirical validation.
reading.portuguese: As implicações epistemológicas, ainda insuficientemente examinadas, justificam exame interdisciplinar rigoroso e validação empírica.

acceptedVariations: I have a dog
I've got a dog
I own a dog
My house is big
My house is large

writing_translate.portuguese: Eu acordei às seis horas hoje.
writing_translate.english: I woke up at six o'clock today.
acceptedVariations: I woke up at six o'clock today
I woke up at 6 o'clock today
I woke up at six today

writing_translate.portuguese: Nós vamos viajar no próximo mês.
writing_translate.english: We are going to travel next month.
acceptedVariations: We are going to travel next month
We will travel next month
We're going to travel next month

writing_translate.english: I have been working a lot lately.
acceptedVariations: I have been working a lot lately
I've been working a lot lately
I have been working hard lately

writing_translate.portuguese: Se eu tivesse tempo, aprenderia francês.
writing_translate.english: If I had time, I would learn French.
acceptedVariations: If I had time, I would learn French
If I had time I would learn French
If I had the time, I would learn French

writing_translate.english: Despite the rain, we decided to go out.
acceptedVariations: Despite the rain, we decided to go out
Despite the rain we decided to go out
In spite of the rain, we decided to go out

writing_translate.portuguese: A empresa tem expandido suas operações globalmente.
writing_translate.english: The company has been expanding its operations globally.
acceptedVariations: The company has been expanding its operations globally
The company has expanded its operations globally

writing_translate.portuguese: Não apenas ele terminou o projeto, mas também superou as expectativas.
writing_translate.english: Not only did he finish the project, but he also exceeded expectations.
acceptedVariations: Not only did he finish the project, but he also exceeded expectations
Not only did he finish the project but he also exceeded expectations

writing_translate.portuguese: A implementação da nova política tem sido fundamental para o sucesso.
writing_translate.english: The implementation of the new policy has been crucial to the success.
acceptedVariations: The implementation of the new policy has been crucial to the success
The implementation of the new policy has been essential to the success
Implementing the new policy has been crucial to the success

writing_translate.portuguese: As ramificações desta decisão ainda não foram totalmente compreendidas.
writing_translate.english: The ramifications of this decision have yet to be fully understood.
acceptedVariations: The ramifications of this decision have yet to be fully understood
The ramifications of this decision are yet to be fully understood

writing_translate.portuguese: A mudança de paradigma exige uma reavaliação abrangente de nossas metodologias.
writing_translate.english: The paradigm shift necessitates a comprehensive reevaluation of our methodologies.
acceptedVariations: The paradigm shift necessitates a comprehensive reevaluation of our methodologies
The paradigm shift requires a comprehensive reevaluation of our methodologies

writing_order.english: My cat is white.
writing_order.portuguese: Meu gato é branco.

writing_order.english: He has a car.
writing_order.portuguese: Ele tem um carro.

writing_order.english: We live in London.
writing_order.portuguese: Nós moramos em Londres.

writing_order.english: This is my book.
writing_order.portuguese: Este é meu livro.

writing_order.english: I want water please.
writing_order.portuguese: Eu quero água por favor.

writing_order.english: She usually drinks coffee in the morning.
writing_order.portuguese: Ela geralmente toma café de manhã.

writing_order.english: We are going to visit Paris next month.
writing_order.portuguese: Nós vamos visitar Paris no próximo mês.

writing_order.english: He has been here since Monday.
writing_order.portuguese: Ele está aqui desde segunda-feira.

writing_order.english: There are many people in the park.
writing_order.portuguese: Há muitas pessoas no parque.

writing_order.english: I can speak English and Spanish.
writing_order.portuguese: Eu consigo falar inglês e espanhol.

writing_order.english: I wish I could travel more often.
writing_order.portuguese: Eu gostaria de poder viajar com mais frequência.

writing_order.english: She has been working here since last year.
writing_order.portuguese: Ela trabalha aqui desde o ano passado.

writing_order.english: Unless you study hard, you won't pass the test.
writing_order.portuguese: A menos que você estude muito, não passará no teste.

writing_order.english: The restaurant where we had dinner was excellent.
writing_order.portuguese: O restaurante onde jantamos foi excelente.

writing_order.english: I would buy that house if I had enough money.
writing_order.portuguese: Eu compraria aquela casa se tivesse dinheiro suficiente.

writing_order.english: Despite feeling tired, she continued working on the presentation.
writing_order.portuguese: Apesar de se sentir cansada, ela continuou trabalhando na apresentação.

writing_order.english: By next week, I will have finished all my assignments.
writing_order.portuguese: Até a próxima semana, terei terminado todas as minhas tarefas.

writing_order.english: No sooner had he arrived than the meeting started.
writing_order.portuguese: Mal ele chegou, a reunião começou.

writing_order.english: The document, having been reviewed thoroughly, was finally approved.
writing_order.portuguese: O documento, tendo sido revisado minuciosamente, foi finalmente aprovado.

writing_order.english: It's high time we took this matter more seriously.
writing_order.portuguese: Já é hora de levarmos este assunto mais a sério.

writing_order.english: Scarcely had the presentation begun when the power failed.
writing_order.portuguese: Mal a apresentação havia começado quando a energia falhou.

writing_order.english: The policy, albeit controversial, represents considerable progress forward.
writing_order.portuguese: A política, embora controversa, representa progresso considerável.

writing_order.english: Under no circumstances should sensitive data be disclosed publicly.
writing_order.portuguese: Em nenhuma circunstância dados sensíveis devem ser divulgados publicamente.

writing_order.english: Were it not for technology, communication would be significantly limited.
writing_order.portuguese: Não fosse pela tecnologia, a comunicação seria significativamente limitada.

writing_order.english: The research, insofar as it has been validated, supports this hypothesis.
writing_order.portuguese: A pesquisa, na medida em que foi validada, apoia esta hipótese.

writing_order.english: The ramifications extend far beyond conventional economic indicators and projections.
writing_order.portuguese: As ramificações se estendem muito além dos indicadores e projeções econômicas convencionais.

writing_order.english: So profound are these implications that comprehensive reassessment becomes imperative.
writing_order.portuguese: Tão profundas são essas implicações que a reavaliação abrangente se torna imperativa.

writing_order.english: Little did researchers anticipate the transformative impact of these discoveries.
writing_order.portuguese: Pouco anteciparam os pesquisadores o impacto transformador dessas descobertas.

writing_order.english: The epistemological implications warrant rigorous interdisciplinary examination and scrutiny.
writing_order.portuguese: As implicações epistemológicas justificam exame e escrutínio interdisciplinar rigoroso.

writing_order.english: Notwithstanding substantial obstacles, the initiative yielded remarkably significant outcomes.
writing_order.portuguese: Apesar de obstáculos substanciais, a iniciativa gerou resultados notavelmente significativos.
